verses.verse: Now <S%H2063>these<s%> are the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you, that you might <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it:

That you might <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, you, and your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and your <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life;<s%> and that your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> therefore, O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it; that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, and that you may <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H3966>mightily,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> has <S%H1696>promised<s%> you, in the <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And you shall <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3966>might.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> shall be in your <S%H3824>heart:<s%>

And you shall <S%H8150>teach<s%> them <S%H8150>diligently<s%> to your <S%H1121>children,<s%> and shall <S%H1696>talk<s%> of them when you <S%H3427>sit<s%> in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and when you <S%H3212>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and when you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> and when you <S%H6965>rise<s%> up.
And you shall <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they shall be as <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
And you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> them on the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> your <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

And it shall be, <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall have <S%H935>brought<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1129>built<s%> not,

And <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2898>good<s%> things, <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H4390>filled<s%> not, and <S%H953>wells<s%> <S%H2672>dig,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H2672>digged<s%> not, <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H2132>olive<s%> trees, <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5193>planted<s%> not; when you shall have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and be <S%H7646>full;<s%>

Then <S%H8104>beware<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>
You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and shall <S%H7650>swear<s%> by his <S%H8034>name.<s%>
You shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> about you;

(For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you) <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
You shall not <S%H5254>tempt<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as you <S%H5254>tempted<s%> him in <S%H4532>Massah.<s%>

You shall diligently <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and his <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

And you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, and that you may <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
To <S%H1920>cast<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> you in <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> mean the <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you?

Then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to your <S%H1121>son,<s%> We were <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5650>slaves<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand:<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>showed<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7451>sore,<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>household,<s%> before our <S%H5869>eyes:<s%>

And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out from <S%H8033>there,<s%> that he might <S%H935>bring<s%> us in, to <S%H5414>give<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> for our <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3605>always,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> that he might <S%H2421>preserve<s%> us <S%H2421>alive,<s%> as it is at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And it shall be our <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> as he has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us.
